title: THE ULTIMATE GUIDE TO DIY GREENHOUSES!

subtasks: Harvest crops from existing garden beds
Clean and prepare the garden area by raking
Measure and mark corners with rebar
Assemble and install purlins and wind bracing
Install center pipe and irrigation lines
Attach greenhouse plastic using appropriate hardware
Secure plastic edges with wiggle wire and ropes
Install trellising wire for future plant support
Add scissor door end walls for ventilation and access
Set up Wi-Fi controlled irrigation system with rainwater catchment
Customize greenhouse using plans from Johnny's Selected Seeds
Apply for and utilize USDA NRCs high tunnel grant program
Prepare no-till garden beds with compost and wood chips
Install and calibrate wi-fi controlled timers and system pumps
